" Tutorial Intro<--> Welcome Let\'s introduce you features of this app. Take a ride through them Check and overcheck Check or overcheck tasks by holding on check icon. You can overcheck the task only once per day Edit titles in list You can simply select the task\'s title and edit it. It will be saved Adding multiple tasks Boring adding one by one tasks? Hold the add button and create multiple tasks Swipe delete Simply swipe to the right to delete task Hold a friend to show menu with removing option Flexibly customize your application within Settings to suit your needs That\'s it!
